page.title: 11 The Football Club.
page.content: The club is called.The Winterborne Kington Football Club. They play in the Dorset League and they are in Division Four North. A few years ago they were in Division Three. They play against other village team such as Sturminster Marshall and Shillingstone. Kevin Pickering and Steve Watts are in charge of the training and Kevin Pickering is the captain.They play their home games on the recreation ground and they use the cricket pavilion for showers and refreshments. Their colours are gold and blue and Barbara Barnes washes their kit every week. There are not many players at the moment who live in the village, so they don't have many spectators.
